title: Break the Frame
summary: Identify the invisible assumption holding the loop in place.
description: Every loop has a belief-frame keeping it alive. This quest asks: what assumption is this loop built on? What would happen if it wasn’t true?

flow.\ud83e\udde0 Step 1: Name the Frame: Message: 'This loop is built on the belief that… [X]'
flow.\ud83d\udd13 Step 2: Ask the Mirror: 'What if this wasn’t true?' or 'What might be more true now?'

optional_recast: Try this on a secondary loop you’ve noticed this week.
absence_response: The frame stayed intact today. That’s okay. Some truths resist pressure.
notes: Breaking the frame isn’t destroying it. It’s *seeing its edge.*
Old beliefs are survival maps — not final truths.
A cracked frame lets new reality leak in.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: What outdated structure might this belief have reinforced?
amplification.loop_signal: Track repeated belief roots and their opening sequences.
amplification.miss_response: 🧱 The frame held today. It’ll crack when you’re ready.
